title: Bobby Addresses People Getting Upset About Garth Winning CMA's EOTY Award + Bobby’s Mailbag: Is It Emotional Cheating To Have Feelings For Someone Who Isn’t Your Significant Other? + Amy Broke Her CMA And Ran Over A Valet Sign
itunes:title: Bobby Addresses People Getting Upset About Garth Winning CMA's EOTY Award + Bobby’s Mailbag: Is It Emotional Cheating To Have Feelings For Someone Who Isn’t Your Significant Other? + Amy Broke Her CMA And Ran Over A Valet Sign
description:
Bobby addresses all of the people getting upset about Garth winning Entertainer of the Year at the CMA's. Bobby opens the mailbag from a listener who has a question about emotional cheating. Amy broke her CMA 15-20 minutes after receiving it and also ran over a valet sign this week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
